# rphilly

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/rsh52/rphilly/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/rsh52/rphilly/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `rphilly` is to provide convenient helper functions and pre-processed datasets from OpenDataPhilly.org

## Installation

You can install the development version of `rphilly` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rsh52/rphilly")
```

> This package is still in development.
